DOC.brief_title: Safety Efficacy Study Food Supplement Pregnant Lactating Women
DOC.criteria: Healthy pregnant woman age 1840 year body mass index ( BMI ) 18.5 30 kg/m2 visit prenatal clinic ( midwife centre ) register . Nulliparous multiparous woman . The woman must able understand verbal write information Swedish give inform consent participate study . Women age 18 40 year old . Women BMI 18.5 30 kg/m2 . Women form anaemia diagnose first visit prenatal clinic . Women expect two baby . Women undergone bariatric surgery . Women medication pharmaceutical could affect result study , e.g. , vitamin K antagonist . Women allergic component WellnessPack mama , e.g. , fish . Women suffer drug alcohol abuse . Women suffer know severe eat disorder . Women suffer chronic disease could affect gastrointestinal absorption metabolism . Women want continue start use similar food supplement addition WellnessPack mama/placebo , unless recommend physician midwife , exclude study .
